pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Wike is a Wikipedia reader for the GNOME Desktop. Provides access to all the content of this online encyclopedia in a native application, with a simpler and distraction-free view of articles.
Features
Open multiple articles in tabs More than 300 languages Search suggestions Bookmarks management History of recent articles Table of contents Text search in articles Print articles Light, dark and sepia themes Desktop and mobile layouts GNOME Shell search integration
